attributes.action: Increase 1% pay rise given to Armed Forces and NHS to a minimum of 2%
attributes.background:
Serving members of the British Armed Forces will face the "perfect storm" of below-inflation pay rises, rising taxes and the prospect of increased rents.

It comes as Politicians receive a 1.4% increase, the equivalent of over £1000 a year for most, and NHS workers also receive the measly 1%.
